item.title: 30-Minute Creamy White Chicken Chili
item.description: This creamy white chicken chili is a comforting bowl of goodness that comes together in just 30 minutes. Packed with flavor and creamy texture, it's perfect for a cozy weeknight dinner or a gathering with friends.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound cooked chicken, shredded
  • 1 can white beans, drained and rinsed
  • 1 cup chicken broth
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1 onion, diced
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 1 teaspoon cumin
  • 1 teaspoon chili powder
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Fresh cilantro for garnish

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
  2. Add diced onion and sautÃ© until translucent, about 5 minutes.
  3. Stir in minced garlic, cumin, and chili powder, cooking for another minute.
  4. Add shredded chicken, white beans, and chicken broth, bringing to a simmer.
  5. Stir in heavy cream and season with salt and pepper, cooking for an additional 10 minutes.
  6. Serve hot, garnished with fresh cilantro.

item.title: Zucchini Stir-Fry
item.description: This one-pan zucchini stir-fry is a delightful blend of sweet and savory flavors, making it a quick and nutritious meal. Perfect for busy weeknights, it comes together in just 25 minutes and is sure to please everyone at the table.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 medium zucchinis, sliced
  • 1 bell pepper, sliced
  • 1 onion, sliced
  • 2 tablespoons soy sauce
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1 teaspoon garlic, minced
  • 1 teaspoon ginger, minced
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
  2. Add onion and sautÃ© until translucent, about 3-4 minutes.
  3. Stir in garlic and ginger, cooking for an additional minute until fragrant.
  4. Add zucchini and bell pepper, cooking for 5-7 minutes until tender.
  5. Pour in soy sauce, stirring to combine, and cook for another 2-3 minutes.
  6. Season with salt and pepper to taste before serving.

item.title: High Protein Creamy Beef Pasta
item.description: This High Protein Creamy Beef Pasta is a delightful blend of rich flavors and creamy texture, making it the perfect quick dinner for busy weeknights. With its hearty ingredients and simple preparation, this dish will quickly become a family favorite.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 8 ounces pasta of your choice
  • 1 pound ground beef
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Fresh parsley for garnish

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Cook pasta according to package instructions; drain and set aside.
  2. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat and add minced garlic.
  3. Add ground beef and cook until browned; season with salt and pepper.
  4. Stir in heavy cream and Parmesan cheese, mixing until creamy.
  5. Add cooked pasta to the skillet and toss to combine.
  6. Serve hot, garnished with fresh parsley.

item.title: Quick & Easy Homemade Butter Chicken
item.description: Savor the rich, creamy flavors of butter chicken made right in your kitchen! This easy recipe is perfect for meal prep and pairs beautifully with naan or rice.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound chicken, cut into bite-sized pieces
  • 2 tablespoons butter
  • 1 onion, finely chopped
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 1 tablespoon ginger, grated
  • 1 can (15 oz) tomato sauce
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 2 teaspoons garam masala
  • 1 teaspoon cumin
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Fresh cilantro for garnish

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat.
  2. Add onion, garlic, and ginger; sautÃ© until onion is translucent.
  3. Stir in chicken pieces and cook until browned on all sides.
  4. Add tomato sauce, heavy cream, garam masala, cumin, salt, and pepper; simmer for 20 minutes.
  5. Garnish with fresh cilantro before serving.

item.title: Best Chili
item.description: This chili recipe is a game changer with tender, fall-apart shredded beef and a unique touch of Mexican Masa Harina. The aroma alone will have your mouth watering and your guests begging for the recipe.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 30 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 480 minutes

â° Total Time: 510 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 12

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 pounds beef chuck roast, shredded
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 onion, diced
  • 4 cloves garlic, minced
  • 2 cans diced tomatoes
  • 2 cans kidney beans, drained
  • 2 tablespoons chili powder
  • 1 tablespoon cumin
  • 1 cup beef broth
  • 1/2 cup Masa Harina
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add diced onion and minced garlic, sautÃ© until translucent.
  2. Add the shredded beef and cook until browned.
  3. Stir in diced tomatoes, kidney beans, chili powder, cumin, and beef broth. Bring to a simmer.
  4. Cover and let simmer for 8 hours, stirring occasionally.
  5. In the last hour, mix Masa Harina with a little water to create a slurry and stir it into the chili to thicken.
  6. Season with salt and pepper to taste before serving.

item.title: Award Winning Turkey Chili
item.description: This Award Winning Turkey Chili is a perfect combination of bold flavors and comforting warmth. Packed with lean turkey, hearty beans, and a blend of spices, itâ€™s the ultimate dish for cozy dinners or meal prep.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 50 minutes

â° Total Time: 65 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 6

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound lean ground turkey
  • 1 can (15 oz) kidney beans, drained and rinsed
  • 1 can (15 oz) black beans, drained and rinsed
  • 1 can (28 oz) crushed tomatoes
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 2 tablespoons chili powder
  • 1 tablespoon cumin
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add chopped onion and garlic, sautÃ© until softened.
  2. Add ground turkey to the pot, cooking until browned.
  3. Stir in chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper, mixing well.
  4. Add kidney beans, black beans, and crushed tomatoes. Bring to a simmer.
  5. Reduce heat and let chili cook for 30-40 minutes, stirring occasionally.

item.title: Easy Crockpot Chili
item.description: This easy Crockpot Chili is a crowd-pleaser with its rich flavors and hearty ingredients. Perfect for chilly nights or gatherings, itâ€™s sure to warm your heart and satisfy your cravings.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 360 minutes

â° Total Time: 375 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 6

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound ground beef
  • 1 can kidney beans, drained
  • 1 can black beans, drained
  • 1 can diced tomatoes
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 2 tablespoons chili powder
  • 1 teaspoon cumin
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a skillet, brown the ground beef over medium heat and drain excess fat.
  2. Add the beef and all other ingredients to the crockpot.
  3. Stir well to combine and cover.
  4. Cook on low for 6-8 hours or high for 3-4 hours.

item.title: Eddie's Award Winning Chili
item.description: Indulge in Eddie's Award Winning Chili, a hearty and flavorful dish that combines tender meats, zesty spices, and a touch of heat. Perfect for gatherings or cozy nights in, this chili is sure to impress your family and friends.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 30 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 210 minutes

â° Total Time: 240 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 10

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound ground beef
  • 1 pound ground pork
  • 2 cans kidney beans, drained and rinsed
  • 2 fresh chile peppers, chopped
  • 1 large onion, diced
  • 4 cloves garlic, minced
  • 2 cans diced tomatoes
  • 1 cup beer
  • 2 tablespoons chili powder
  • 1 tablespoon cumin
  • 1 tablespoon paprika
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a large pot, brown the ground beef and pork over medium heat until fully cooked.
  2. Add the onions and garlic, cooking until softened.
  3. Stir in the chopped chile peppers, diced tomatoes, kidney beans, and beer.
  4. Season with chili powder, cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper.
  5. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and let simmer for at least 3 hours, stirring occasionally.

item.title: Spicy Steak Chili
item.description: This Spicy Steak Chili is a hearty and flavorful dish that brings warmth and excitement to any meal. Packed with tender steak, beans, and a kick of spice, it's perfect for gatherings or cozy nights in.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 8

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 large onion, chopped

  • 1 teaspoon salt

  • 2 cups beef broth
  • 1 can diced tomatoes
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
  2. Add the chopped onion and sautÃ© until translucent.
  3. Add the cubed steak and brown on all sides.
  4. Stir in the chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper.
  5. Add the beef broth and diced tomatoes, bringing the mixture to a simmer.
  6. Stir in the beans and let the chili cook for at least one hour, stirring occasionally.

item.title: Easy Honey Pepper Chicken Pasta
item.description: Discover the ultimate comfort food with this Honey Pepper Chicken Pasta recipe! Succulent chicken, sweet honey, and a hint of spice come together to create a mouthwatering dish that will impress family and friends.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound chicken breast, diced
  • 2 tablespoons honey
  • 1 teaspoon black pepper
  • 8 ounces pasta of your choice
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 cup mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, etc.)
  • Salt to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Cook pasta according to package instructions; drain and set aside.
  2. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat.
  3. Add diced chicken and cook until browned, about 5-7 minutes.
  4. Stir in honey, black pepper, and mixed vegetables; cook for an additional 5 minutes.
  5. Combine the chicken mixture with the cooked pasta, season with salt, and serve.

item.title: Award Winning Short Rib and Chorizo Chili
item.description: This Award Winning Short Rib and Chorizo Chili is packed with tender beef and bold flavors, making it the perfect comfort food for any occasion. With its rich and hearty ingredients, it's sure to become a favorite in your household.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 20 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 120 minutes

â° Total Time: 140 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 6

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 pounds beef short ribs
  • 1 pound Mexican chorizo, casings removed
  • 2 cans fire-roasted tomatoes
  • 1 onion, diced
  • 4 cloves garlic, minced
  • 2 tablespoons chili powder
  • 1 tablespoon cumin
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 2 cups beef broth
  • 1 can kidney beans, drained and rinsed

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a large pot, brown the short ribs over medium-high heat, then remove and set aside.
  2. In the same pot, add chorizo and cook until browned, then add onion and garlic, cooking until softened.
  3. Stir in chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper, cooking for another minute.
  4. Add the fire-roasted tomatoes, beef broth, and short ribs back to the pot.
  5. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 1.5 to 2 hours until the ribs are tender.
  6. Remove the short ribs, shred the meat, and return it to the pot along with the kidney beans.
  7. Simmer for an additional 15 minutes before serving.

item.title: Ultimate Quick and Easy Chicken Enchiladas
item.description: Indulge in the delightful flavors of these Ultimate Quick and Easy Chicken Enchiladas, perfect for busy weeknights or cozy family dinners. With tender shredded chicken, gooey cheese, and zesty enchilada sauce, this dish is sure to impress your loved ones!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 cups shredded chicken
  • 1 cup enchilada sauce
  • 1 cup shredded cheese
  • 8 corn tortillas
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1 teaspoon cumin
  • 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C).
  2. In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat and add shredded chicken, cumin, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Cook for about 5 minutes until heated through.
  3. Warm the corn tortillas in a separate pan until pliable.
  4. Fill each tortilla with the chicken mixture and a sprinkle of cheese, then roll them up and place seam side down in a baking dish.
  5. Pour enchilada sauce over the top and sprinkle with remaining cheese.
  6. Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes until the cheese is bubbly and golden.

item.title: Effortless Crispy Orange Chicken
item.description: Craving a dish that's both crispy and packed with flavor? Discover our Effortless Crispy Orange Chicken recipe! This mouthwatering meal combines tender chicken with a zesty orange glaze thatâ€™s sure to please the whole family.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound chicken, cut into bite-sized pieces

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a bowl, mix orange juice, soy sauce, honey, and cornstarch until well combined.

  4. Cook chicken for about 5-7 minutes, turning occasionally until golden brown.
  5. Pour the orange sauce over the chicken and cook for an additional 5 minutes until the sauce thickens and coats the chicken.

item.title: Ultimate Quick and Easy Chicken Enchiladas
item.description: These Ultimate Quick and Easy Chicken Enchiladas are a delicious and simple way to bring the family together for dinner. With tender shredded chicken, gooey cheese, and zesty enchilada sauce, this dish is sure to impress!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 cups cooked shredded chicken
  • 1 cup shredded cheese
  • 1 cup enchilada sauce
  • 8 small tortillas
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1 teaspoon cumin
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C).
  2. In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat and add shredded chicken, cumin, salt, and pepper.
  3. Warm the tortillas in the microwave for about 30 seconds to make them pliable.
  4. Fill each tortilla with the chicken mixture, roll them up, and place them seam-side down in a baking dish.
  5. Pour enchilada sauce over the top and sprinkle with shredded cheese.
  6. Bake for 20 minutes or until the cheese is bubbly and golden.

item.title: Garlic Butter Cheeseburger Rollups
item.description: These Garlic Butter Cheeseburger Rollups are the perfect blend of comfort and fun, transforming classic cheeseburger flavors into a shareable, cheesy delight. With gooey cheese and a golden crust, they are sure to be a hit at any gathering.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 20 minutes

â° Total Time: 35 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 6

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 lb ground beef
  • 1 tsp garlic powder
  • 1 tsp onion powder
  • Salt & pepper, to taste
  • 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese
  • 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese
  • 1 package refrigerated pizza dough
  • 2 Tbsp butter, melted
  • 1 clove garlic, minced

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C) or according to your dough package.
  2. Cook beef in a skillet until browned. Season with garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper. Drain excess grease.
  3. Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface. Sprinkle cheddar evenly across.
  4. Spoon beef over cheddar, then sprinkle mozzarella on top.
  5. Roll dough into a log, pinching seam to seal.
  6. Brush with melted garlic butter.
  7. Place seam-side down on a baking sheet lined with parchment.
  8. Bake 18â€“20 minutes, until golden. Rest 5 minutes, then slice and serve hot.

item.title: Chicken Enchiladas with Sour Cream White Sauce
item.description: Indulge in these creamy, cheesy Chicken Enchiladas with Sour Cream White Sauce that are bursting with flavor. Perfect for a cozy dinner, these enchiladas are sure to become a family favorite.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 8

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 cups cooked chicken, shredded
  • 8 flour tortillas

  • 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • 1 teaspoon onion powder
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
  2. In a bowl, mix shredded chicken, green chilies, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper.
  3. Fill each tortilla with the chicken mixture, roll them up, and place them seam-side down in a baking dish.
  4. In another bowl, combine sour cream and half of the shredded cheese, then pour over the enchiladas.
  5. Sprinkle the remaining cheese on top and bake for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and golden.

item.title: Hamburger Stew
item.description: This Hamburger Stew is a comforting and hearty dish that combines the rich flavors of ground beef with vegetables in a savory broth. Perfect for a cozy dinner, it's both easy to make and satisfying to eat.

item.content:encoded:

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
  2. Add chopped onion and sautÃ© until translucent.
  3. Stir in ground beef and cook until browned.
  4. Add carrots, potatoes, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
  5. Pour in beef broth and bring to a boil.
  6. Reduce heat and let simmer for 20 minutes, or until vegetables are tender.

item.title: Mongolian Ground Beef Noodles
item.description: Discover the bold flavors of Mongolian cuisine with these savory ground beef noodles. Combining tender beef, flavorful sauce, and perfectly cooked noodles, this dish is quick to prepare and packed with rich, aromatic spices.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound ground beef
  • 8 ounces noodles
  • 2 tablespoons soy sauce
  • 1 tablespoon oyster sauce
  • 1 tablespoon sesame oil
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 1 teaspoon ginger, minced
  • 1 bell pepper, sliced
  • 2 green onions, chopped
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Cook the noodles according to package instructions, then drain and set aside.
  2. In a large skillet, heat sesame oil over medium heat and add garlic and ginger, sautÃ©ing until fragrant.
  3. Add ground beef to the skillet, cooking until browned and fully cooked.
  4. Stir in soy sauce, oyster sauce, bell pepper, and cooked noodles, mixing well to combine.
  5. Cook for an additional 5 minutes, allowing flavors to meld, then season with salt and pepper to taste.
  6. Garnish with chopped green onions before serving.

item.title: Italian Sausage Bow Tie Pasta
item.description: This Italian Sausage Bow Tie Pasta is a weeknight wonder that combines tender pasta with savory sausage in a creamy sauce. It's quick, easy, and utterly irresistible, making it the perfect dish for busy evenings.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 12 ounces bow tie pasta
  • 1 pound Italian sausage, casings removed
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Fresh basil for garnish

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Cook bow tie pasta according to package instructions; drain and set aside.
  2. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat and add the Italian sausage, breaking it apart with a spoon.
  3. Cook until browned and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
  4. Add minced garlic and cook for an additional minute until fragrant.
  5. Stir in heavy cream and bring to a simmer.
  6. Add grated Parmesan cheese and stir until melted and combined.
  7. Toss the cooked pasta with the sauce, seasoning with salt and pepper to taste.
  8. Serve hot, garnished with fresh basil.

item.title: Pasta Aglio e Olio
item.description: Indulge in the simplicity and bold flavors of Pasta Aglio e Olio, a classic Italian dish that comes together in just minutes. With garlic, olive oil, and a hint of spice, this dish is perfect for a quick weeknight dinner or a cozy gathering with friends.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 15 minutes

â° Total Time: 30 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 400g spaghetti
  • 6 cloves garlic, minced
  • 100ml olive oil
  • dried red chili flakes
  • fresh parsley, chopped
  • salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water according to package instructions until al dente.
  2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat and sautÃ© the minced garlic until fragrant but not browned.
  3. Add the dried chili flakes and chopped parsley to the skillet, stirring to combine.
  4. Drain the spaghetti and add it to the skillet, tossing well to coat the pasta in the garlic oil mixture.
  5. Season with salt and pepper to taste, then serve immediately.
